languages.text: {n}Блеск в глазах Регины Зауэрбэк выдает ее неподдельный интерес к вам.{/n} "Надеюсь, на этом наше знакомство не оборвется. Вы ведь не будете против, если я буду иногда вам писать, Ваша Светлость?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Блеск в глазах Регины Зауэрбек выдает ее неподдельный интерес к вам.{/n} "Надеюсь, на этом наше знакомство не оборвется. Вы ведь не будете против, если я буду иногда вам писать, Ваша милость?"

languages.text: {n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Блеск в глазах Регины Зауэрбэк выдает ее неподдельный интерес к вам.{/n} "Надеюсь, на этом наше знакомство не оборвется. Вы ведь не будете против, если я буду иногда вам писать, Ваша Светлость?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

{n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

{n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

{n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

{n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

languages.text: {n}レジーナの目に宿る光は、あなたに対する純粋な興味を示している。{/n}「今回限りで関係が終わるというのは残念です。よろしければ、時々お手紙を差し上げたいのですが、いかがでしょうか、陛下？」
languages.original_text: {n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}レジーナの目に宿る光は、あなたに対する純粋な興味を示している。{/n}「今回限りで関係が終わるというのは残念です。よろしければ、時々お手紙を差し上げたいのですが、いかがでしょうか、陛下？」

languages.text: {n}蕾吉娜眼中闪烁着光芒，表明她对你充满了真挚的兴趣。{/n}“希望我们之间的交流不会就此结束。您该不会介意我时不时给您写封信吧，大人？”
languages.original_text: {n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}蕾吉娜眼中闪烁着光芒，表明她对你充满了真挚的兴趣。{/n}“希望我们之间的交流不会就此结束。您该不会介意我时不时给您写封信吧，大人？”

languages.text: {n}El brillo que desprenden los ojos de Regina delata su sincero interés por ti.{/n} «Espero que este no sea el fin de nuestra simpatía. ¿Le importaría que le escribiera de vez en cuando, {mf|milord|milady}?».
languages.original_text: {n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El brillo que desprenden los ojos de Regina delata su sincero interés por ti.{/n} «Espero que este no sea el fin de nuestra simpatía. ¿Le importaría que le escribiera de vez en cuando, {mf|milord|milady}?».

languages.text: {n}Vous lisez dans le regard de Régina un intérêt certain pour votre personne.{/n} « J'espère que notre relation ne se limitera pas à cette soirée. Accepteriez-vous par exemple que je vous écrive de temps en temps, Votre Seigneurie ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous lisez dans le regard de Régina un intérêt certain pour votre personne.{/n} « J'espère que notre relation ne se limitera pas à cette soirée. Accepteriez-vous par exemple que je vous écrive de temps en temps, Votre Seigneurie ? »

languages.text: {n}Das Funkeln in Reginas Augen kündet von einem echten Interesse an dir.{/n} "Hoffentlich ist das nicht das Ende unserer Bekanntschaft. Es würde Euch doch nicht stören, wenn ich Euch hin und wieder schreibe, oder, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?"
languages.original_text: {n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Funkeln in Reginas Augen kündet von einem echten Interesse an dir.{/n} "Hoffentlich ist das nicht das Ende unserer Bekanntschaft. Es würde Euch doch nicht stören, wenn ich Euch hin und wieder schreibe, oder, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?"

languages.text: {n}Regina'nın gözlerinin ışıldaması, sana gerçekten ilgi duyduğunu ele veriyor.{/n} "Umarım sohbetimiz burada son bulmaz. Acaba arada sırada size mektup yazsam sorun olur mu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri?"
languages.original_text: {n}The glint in Regina's eyes betrays her genuine interest in you.{/n} "I hope this won't be the end of our acquaintance. You wouldn't mind if I wrote you from time to time, would you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina'nın gözlerinin ışıldaması, seninle gerçekten ilgilendiğini ele veriyor.{/n} "Umarım sohbetimiz burada son bulmaz. Acaba arada sırada size mektup yazsam sorun olur mu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri?"
